update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [TC74 Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tc74.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: The I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x48`, the address of the TC74A0. For suffixes other than `A0` add the final digit to `0x48` to calculate the address. For example, the TC74A5 has I²C address `0x4D`.

*See also: [TC74 Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tc74.html#configuration-variables)*
